author: Staff Reporter
text:
A woman, seeking employment under noon meal scheme, approached Collector M. Ravikumar on Monday, and alleged that a mid day meal organiser was appointed based on a “wrong family card”.

Accompanied by her husband and child, who is mentally ill, Vasantha of Valampatti village in Ettayapuram taluk staged a dharna at the Collectorate seeking the intervention of the district administration to cancel the “wrongful” appointment. After police personnel pacified the woman , she submitted a petition to the Collector.

In her petition, Ms. Vasantha said that she had applied for the post of mid day meal organiser at a school in Ettayapuram taluk. She had sought priority to her in view of the mental condition of her daughter. But, a woman of the same locality, who was in possession of a family card showing her as a resident of Kailasapuram in Ottapidaram taluk, was appointed to the post.

The Collector told the woman that no malpractice was allowed and noon meal scheme appointments were made as per rules and regulations. However, her complaint would be looked into, he added.
title: Woman cries foul over appointment of noon meal organiser
